title: TCT Clip: Living Under ISIS -  Omar's aliases, a wish for death, and a rebirth
description:
In honor of the fourth anniversary of the liberation of Mosul from ISIS, I'm posting a clip of my discussion with the extraordinary Omar Mohammed, creator of Mosul Eye. Here he discusses the aliases or "characters" he assumed while gathering information in the ISIS-occupied streets of Mosul, the burden which drove him to wish for death, and his eventual loss of fear and "rebirth" as a stronger person.

https://mosul-eye.org/
https://twitter.com/MosulEye
